attributes.action: Make First Aid a part of the National Compulsory Curriculum in Schools.
attributes.additional_details:
Schools already have classes such as PSE/PHSE. This is where pupils get taught about Sex Education, How to pay bills, politics. SO WHY NOT INCLUDE FIRST AID.

Read this document from the Heart Foundation website.

http://www.heart.org/HEARTORG/CPRAndECC/WhatisCPR/CPRFactsandStats/CPR-Statistics_UCM_307542_Article.jsp#mainContent
attributes.background:
Every year thousands of people die when simple First Aid could have prevented death.

It takes 20 minutes to show a class of children how and when todo CPR. If every child in Britain knew how todo CPR, or place a adult in the recovery position, possibly thousands of lives can be saved.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105790

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
